title: Upscale Lofts! Minutes From Downtown!
posting_body: Welcome to Dallas' new mixed-use development.
Easily accessible by foot and bike, your new crossroads for shopping, eating and living is family friendly and accessible by foot, bike or car.
Located directly adjacent to the interstate.
Grocer, baker, café and butcher right at your doorstep!
Easy access to I30 and Downtown Dallas.
With farmers markets, public art displays by local artisans and countless community events.
We always offers a hub of activity in the community.
Our property includes more than 200 studios and lofts, local retailers and a local, organic grocery market with farm fresh produce, artisan breads and a high-quality butcher.
Espresso Wood Cabinetry with Modern Chrome Hardware
Private Patio or Juliet Balcony in Every Home
mention ad D 200 Dash Apartment Locators
***Requirements to receive your FREE 2 HOUR MOVE ****
Contact me prior to visiting apartments so I can pre-register you.
When you visit the community , please remember to list Desiree with DASH as your referral source on all guest cards and rental applications.
Most free moves require a 12 month lease.
This must happen to for me to be able to provide you the FREE 2 HOUR MOVE
